stimulusHtml: Which of the following conclusions can be drawn from the data comparing fluid intelligence and crystallized intelligence over the life span of a person?

features.html:
Fluid Intelligence and Crystallized Intelligence Across the Life Span

  • Two lines are presented.
  • The first line is labeled Fluid:
    • The Fluid line begins at Birth, rises steadily to peak at 30 years, then steadily declines.
  • The second line is labeled Crystallized:
    • The Crystallized line begins slightly above the Fluid line.
    • The Crystallized line steadily increases at every age point and shows no decline with age.
Researchers conducted a study comparing intelligence levels of people across their life spans, as shown in the graph.

choicesHtml: Fluid intelligence tends to be stable over the life span.
Crystallized intelligence is at its highest level in early childhood.
Crystallized intelligence and fluid intelligence begin to diverge around 30 years of age.
Fluid intelligence is more developed than crystallized intelligence until puberty.
